Articles.Content:
Quick question is there a "Stail" class crew cabin?

I want to make a SSTO the humpback class is a bit too big but it does have a crew cabin for more kerbals. The stail class is almost perfect it has a lab modules and has a nice size but i cant find crew cabins.

3 hours ago, koto said:

Quick question is there a "Stail" class crew cabin?

Hi there. No, there is none. Consider filling a Stail cargo bay with a long Mk2 cabin from Mk2 Stockalike Expansion or a 1.875m or 2.5m cabin from the other plane parts mods. Or if you know a little MM you can clone and tweak the Stail lab to make a regular cabin.

Or... (assuming you don't insist on Legacy) use the J body from OPT Continued.
